comments.body: It looks like this is not in `carbon-components-react` v.7.6.x so this line will need to be updated: https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/d56b018b0d6fcbedf0053400c80def5efddd53ab/types/carbon-components-react/index.d.ts#L1 . If it was introduced in v7.7.x, it should be `7.7`, `v8.0.x` would be `8.0` etc.
That line affects the version of the types package published to the registry and they suggest it should align with the real package as much as possible.

The `align` prop is there in branch `v10.6.4`, see [TooltipDefinition#78](https://github.com/carbon-design-system/carbon/blob/v10.6.4/packages/react/src/components/TooltipDefinition/TooltipDefinition.js#L78).

You can also see in the [package.json#4](https://github.com/carbon-design-system/carbon/blob/v10.6.4/packages/react/package.json) from the same branch that the version `7.6.0` is still there.
Looks like I mixed myself up.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +7,11 @@    direction?: Extract<Direction, "bottom" | "top">, // required but has default value
    align?: TooltipAlignment,
    triggerClassName?: string
    tooltipText: NonNullable<React.ReactNode>,
}
